summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Fifty-eighth Street from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Fourteenth Avenue Northwest in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains under Ordinance No. 20417, creating Local Improvement District No. 2012 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
